Text:
Scrambled at the start, goes randomly blue about 2 minutes in for a few seconds and has a huge black border around it the whole time. Barely watchable.

Screenshot: http://i110.photobucket.com/albums/n92/General-Jazza/vlcsnap-195506.jpg

Disappointing. He interviews a bunch of losers.
It doesn't teach you how to gamble at all.
highlander777: I'd be disappointed if he *didn't* interview "a bunch of losers", since that's what he does in all of his shows. (Well, maybe not losers as much as weirdos.)
Don't listen to "MrLore". The file is very watchable. Just increase the size of the player window to get rid of the black border.
